    • Uses of IOptimizer in ch.pschatzmann.stocks.strategy.optimization

      Classes in ch.pschatzmann.stocks.strategy.optimization that implement IOptimizer 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  BinarySearchOptimizer
      We optimize a single parameter using a binary search.
      class  BruteForceOptimizer
      We try all combinations of all parameter values in order to find the optimum.
      class  GeneticOptimizer
      Optimizer which uses a genetic algorithm to optimize the parameters.
      class  PermutatedBinarySearchOptimizer
      We optimize a single parameter using a binary search.
      class  SequenceOptimizer
      We try all combinations of all parameter values in order to find the optimum.
      class  SimulatedAnnealingOptimizer
      Optimizer using SimulatedAnnealing https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Simulated_annealing
